Description: Egypt, group portrait of Turkish adult male with three adult female wives and Nubian [?] servant. Male wearing patterned gown, belt, turban, beard and moustache. Wives wearing elaborate tailored costumes including sloppers, stockings [?], trousers, blouses, embroidered waist-coats, veils, head-ornaments. Male and wives sitting on couch and floor, surrounded by rugs, foot-stool, pot plants. Servant kneeling at left, wearing dark gown, offering drinks on tray. Painted backdrop depicting lavish interior. Albumen print. Format: Print mounted on card, second print on other side of card.
